fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Enlargement, Energy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives: The primary focus of our EU office is democratic deficit and backsliding in Europe and supporting democratic reform throughout the region.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Our work focuses on helping political parties become more issue-based and responsive, helping citizens participate in government planning and decision-making, and increasing the role of marginalized groups in the political process – including women and youth.
